message: I'm feeling generous. Let's get this over with quickly.
Alice, that's not a generous offer at all! Let's be fair to each other. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take this offer, otherwise the money will be worth even less in the next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is too lopsided. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every round! A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Let's end this before we both lose out.
